test.name: Cadastro - Cadastro com E-mail e Senha

kw.name: Acessar Tela Inicial
Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.
Abre o navegador, maximiza a janela e clica no botão "Password-based Authentication."

kw.name: Acessar Tela de Cadastro
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.
Clica no botão "Create a new account" para acessar a tela de cadastro.

kw.name: Preencher Campos de Login
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
Preenche os campos de e-mail e senha no formulário de login.

kw.name: Clicar Botão Signup
Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.
Clica no botão de cadastro (Signup).

kw.name: Verificar Redirecionamento Cadastro
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.
Verifica se o redirecionamento após cadastro foi bem-sucedido.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.

kw.name: Fechar Navegador
Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

Abre o navegador, maximiza a janela e clica no botão "Password-based Authentication."
